control.name: icbScrollBars
control.description: This combo box allows the visibility of scroll bars to be specified. If the WordWrap check box is checked, the horizontal scroll bar isn't displayed.

control.name: ceWordWrap
control.description: This check box switches automatic word wrapping on or off.

control.name: ceReturn
control.description: This check box allows you to specify whether return characters are accepted and processed by the memo editor or form.

control.name: ceTab
control.description: This check box allows you to specify whether TAB characters can be inserted into text.

control.name: seMaxLength
control.description: This spin editor allows the maximum number of characters an end-user can enter to be specified.
